memberdef.name: portSET_INTERRUPT_MASK
memberdef.initializer: __asm volatile \ ( \ " mov r0, %0 \n" \ " msr basepri, r0 \n" \ ::"i"(configMAX_SYSCALL_INTERRUPT_PRIORITY):"r0" \ )

memberdef.name: portCLEAR_INTERRUPT_MASK
memberdef.initializer: __asm volatile \ ( \ " mov r0, #0 \n" \ " msr basepri, r0 \n" \ :::"r0" \ )
